chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 13 product has the above problem: The shipment could not be delivered apparently on 05-06-2024. Since then, the status at UPS remains unchanged that delivery will occur on the next working day. However, neither yesterday nor today has attempted to deliver the package. Someone was always home. Unfortunately, I had no success in contacting UPS through their online functions or obtaining more details. Thank you for your support! Many thanks for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer has not yet received the delivery.

The customer was at home the whole time and no delivery attempt was made.

Could you please contact the delivery person and ask where the package is.

Regards,
Ercan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Ercan - Back Market

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Ercan - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for providing us with the relevant documents. We will continue our investigation with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do NOT refund the customer.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

Have you already sent the replacement device?

I ask you to provide a valid tracking number today, otherwise we will initiate the refund in your name tomorrow.

Regards,
Ercan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We are awaiting updates from our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Regards,
AS

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Thank you.

Regards,
KW
